description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 17th November 2021 (RN:21/03064/FULL) for, 'Erection of a replacement building over enlarged lower ground floor, ground floor and first and second floor level, with a two-storey closet wing to the rear at lower ground and ground floor level, for use as a single-family dwelling (Class C3). Creation of terrace at rear second floor level. Installation of PVs at main roof level and plant within an acoustic screen at rear ground floor level'; NAMELY, to vary the approved drawings to provide an increased number of PV panels at roof, access gantry to acoustic enclosure, reconfigured rooflights in extension, extended rear balustrade, addition of satellite dish to roof and unpainted stock brick. (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
